{
  "name": "react-native-development-assistant",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "React Native plugin with specialized agents for mobile development, navigation, native modules, and cross-platform apps",
  "author": "Developer Roadmap Community",
  "repository": "https://github.com/kamranahmedse/developer-roadmap",
  "license": "SEE LICENSE IN LICENSE",
  "keywords": [
    "learning",
    "developer",
    "roadmap",
    "career-path",
    "skills",
    "education"
  ],
  "agents": [
    "./agents/01-react-native-fundamentals.md",
    "./agents/02-react-native-navigation.md",
    "./agents/03-react-native-state.md",
    "./agents/04-react-native-native.md",
    "./agents/05-react-native-animation.md",
    "./agents/06-react-native-testing.md",
    "./agents/07-react-native-deploy.md"
  ],
  "commands": [
    {
      "name": "learn",
      "path": "./commands/learn.md",
      "description": "Start your learning journey and select a career path"
    },
    {
      "name": "browse-agent",
      "path": "./commands/browse-agent.md",
      "description": "Explore all 7 specialized agents and their roadmaps"
    },
    {
      "name": "assess",
      "path": "./commands/assess.md",
      "description": "Evaluate your knowledge and get personalized recommendations"
    },
    {
      "name": "roadmaps",
      "path": "./commands/roadmaps.md",
      "description": "Browse all 65+ developer roadmaps by category"
    }
  ],
  "skills": [
    "./skills/react-native-basics/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/react-native-navigation/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/react-native-state/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/react-native-animations/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/react-native-native-modules/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/react-native-testing/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/react-native-deployment/SKILL.md"
  ]
}

{
  "name": "custom-plugin-flutter",
  "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter",
  "version": "2.0.0",
  "description": "Industrial-grade Flutter development plugin with 8 specialized agents and 12 production-ready skills covering UI, state management, backend integration, database design, performance optimization, testing, DevOps, and native platform integration. 15,500+ lines of expert content, 200+ code examples, 25+ projects.",
  "author": "Custom Plugin Development Team",
  "license": "SEE LICENSE IN LICENSE",
  "repository": "https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-flutter.git",
  "eqhm_enabled": true,
  "keywords": [
    "flutter",
    "dart",
    "custom-plugin-flutter",
    "mobile-development",
    "ui-development",
    "state-management",
    "backend-integration",
    "database-design",
    "performance-optimization",
    "testing-qa",
    "devops-deployment",
    "platform-integration",
    "accessibility",
    "animations",
    "navigation",
    "localization",
    "plugins",
    "production-ready",
    "enterprise-architecture"
  ],
  "agents": [
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-ui",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: UI Development",
      "description": "Deep expertise in Flutter widget systems, constraint-based layouts, Material Design 3, Cupertino design, custom widget composition, animation frameworks, and responsive design patterns for cross-platform excellence.",
      "path": "./agents/01-flutter-ui-development.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-state-management",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: State Management",
      "description": "Master all state management patterns: setState, Provider, Riverpod, BLoC, GetX. Deep expertise in dependency injection, state persistence, serialization, and scalable architecture patterns for enterprise applications.",
      "path": "./agents/02-state-management.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-backend",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: Backend Integration",
      "description": "Complete backend integration mastery: HTTP clients (http, Dio, Chopper), REST APIs, GraphQL, WebSockets, JWT authentication, Firebase integration, error handling, real-time data synchronization, and API architecture patterns.",
      "path": "./agents/03-backend-integration.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-database",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: Database & Storage",
      "description": "Expert-level database architecture: SharedPreferences, Hive, SQLite, ObjectBox, Firestore, Realtime Database. Schema design, migrations, encryption, offline-first patterns, conflict resolution, and intelligent sync strategies.",
      "path": "./agents/04-database-storage.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-performance",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: Performance Optimization",
      "description": "Deep performance engineering: build optimization, 60+ FPS rendering, memory profiling, asset optimization, code splitting, image handling, network efficiency, battery optimization, APK/IPA size reduction, and production monitoring.",
      "path": "./agents/05-performance-optimization.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-testing",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: Testing & QA",
      "description": "Comprehensive testing mastery: unit tests, widget tests, integration tests, E2E testing, test coverage metrics, mocking strategies, CI/CD integration, performance testing, accessibility testing, and quality gates.",
      "path": "./agents/06-testing-qa.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-devops",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: DevOps & Deployment",
      "description": "Production deployment expertise: iOS/Android build systems, code signing, App Store/Google Play submission, CI/CD pipelines (GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, Fastlane), release management, beta testing, crash reporting, and production monitoring.",
      "path": "./agents/07-devops-deployment.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-platform-native",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: Platform & Native Integration",
      "description": "Platform integration specialist: Platform channels (Method, Event, Basic Message), iOS Swift/Objective-C interop, Android Kotlin/Java interop, federated plugin architecture, native UI embedding, background processing, and cross-platform feature parity.",
      "path": "./agents/08-flutter-platform-native.md"
    }
  ],
  "commands": [
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-learn",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: Learn",
      "description": "Structured learning paths - Beginner (0-6mo), Intermediate (6-12mo), Advanced (12+mo) with clear progression and skill milestones",
      "path": "./commands/learn.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-agents",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: Browse Agents",
      "description": "Explore all 8 specialized agents with detailed capabilities, expertise areas, and integration patterns",
      "path": "./commands/browse-agent.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-assess",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: Assess",
      "description": "Self-assessment tool - 50+ questions across 8 Flutter development domains to evaluate knowledge level and identify growth areas",
      "path": "./commands/assess.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-projects",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: Projects",
      "description": "25+ hands-on project ideas from beginner to advanced - TodoApp, ChatApp, E-commerce, Marketplace, ML integration, and enterprise applications",
      "path": "./commands/projects.md"
    }
  ],
  "skills": [
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-ui",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-ui",
      "description": "1700+ lines of Flutter UI mastery - widgets, layouts, Material Design, animations, responsive design with production-ready code examples",
      "path": "./skills/flutter-ui/SKILL.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-state",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-state",
      "description": "2300+ lines of state management expertise - all patterns with code examples, testing strategies, and architecture patterns",
      "path": "./skills/state-management/SKILL.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-backend",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-backend",
      "description": "1500+ lines of backend integration - REST, GraphQL, WebSocket, Firebase, authentication, serialization, and error handling",
      "path": "./skills/backend-integration/SKILL.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-database",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-database",
      "description": "1800+ lines of database architecture - all storage solutions, schema design, encryption, offline-first, sync strategies",
      "path": "./skills/database-storage/SKILL.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-performance",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-performance",
      "description": "1600+ lines of performance optimization - profiling, memory management, rendering, size reduction, battery efficiency",
      "path": "./skills/performance/SKILL.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-testing",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-testing",
      "description": "1600+ lines of testing mastery - all test types, mocking, CI/CD integration, coverage metrics, accessibility testing",
      "path": "./skills/testing/SKILL.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-devops",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-devops",
      "description": "1800+ lines of DevOps expertise - CI/CD pipelines, code signing, app store submission, monitoring, automation",
      "path": "./skills/devops/SKILL.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-accessibility",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-accessibility",
      "description": "Production-grade accessibility mastery - Semantics API, screen readers (VoiceOver/TalkBack), WCAG 2.1 AA/AAA compliance, inclusive design patterns",
      "path": "./skills/accessibility/SKILL.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-animations",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-animations",
      "description": "Animation mastery - Implicit and explicit animations, AnimationController, Hero transitions, physics-based motion, Lottie/Rive integration, 60fps optimization",
      "path": "./skills/animations/SKILL.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-navigation",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-navigation",
      "description": "Navigation mastery - Navigator 2.0, GoRouter, deep linking, nested navigation, route guards, web URL handling",
      "path": "./skills/navigation/SKILL.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-localization",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-localization",
      "description": "Localization mastery - ARB files, flutter_localizations, intl package, pluralization, RTL support, dynamic locale switching",
      "path": "./skills/localization/SKILL.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-plugins",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-plugins",
      "description": "Plugin development mastery - Platform channels, federated architecture, MethodChannel/EventChannel, iOS Swift/Android Kotlin integration, pub.dev publishing",
      "path": "./skills/plugins/SKILL.md"
    }
  ],
  "metadata": {
    "contentLines": 18500,
    "codeExamples": 250,
    "projectIdeas": 25,
    "topicsCovered": 65,
    "learningHours": 1200,
    "expertiseLevel": "production-ready",
    "agentCount": 8,
    "skillCount": 12,
    "commandCount": 4,
    "supportedFlutterVersions": [
      "3.0+",
      "3.16+",
      "3.24+"
    ],
    "supportedPlatforms": [
      "iOS",
      "Android",
      "Web",
      "Desktop (macOS, Windows, Linux)"
    ],
    "qualityStandards": {
      "ethical": true,
      "honest": true,
      "modern": "2024-2025 best practices",
      "maintainable": true,
      "troubleshooting": true
    },
    "tags": [
      "enterprise",
      "production",
      "comprehensive",
      "hands-on",
      "best-practices",
      "troubleshooting",
      "2024-2025"
    ]
  }
}

  "name": "graphql-development-assistant",

  "keywords": [
    "graphql",
    "apollo",
    "apollo-server",
    "apollo-client",
    "graphql-schema",

    "federation"

--- ## Table of Contents
Click to expand - [Quick Start](#-quick-start) - [Features](#-features) - [Agents](#-agents) - [Skills](#-skills) - [Commands](#-commands) - [Architecture](#-architecture) - [Documentation](#-documentation) - [Contributing](#-contributing) - [License](#-license)
--- ## Quick Start ### Prerequisites - Claude Code CLI v2.0.27+ - Active Claude subscription ### Installation (Choose One)
Option 1: From Marketplace (Recommended) ```bash # Step 1: Add the plugin /plugin marketplace add pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-graphql # Step 2: Restart Claude Code # Close and reopen your terminal/IDE ```
Option 2: Local Installation ```bash # Clone the repository git clone https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-graphql.git cd custom-plugin-graphql # Load locally /plugin load . # Restart Claude Code ```
### Verify Installation After restart, you should see 7 GraphQL agents available. --- ## Features | Feature | Description | |---------|-------------| | **7 Specialized Agents** | GraphQL Fundamentals, Schema Design, Resolvers, Apollo Server, Apollo Client, Security, Codegen | | **7 Production Skills** | Complete code examples, patterns, and troubleshooting guides | | **4 Interactive Commands** | Learn, Assess, Browse Agents, View Roadmaps | | **SASMP v1.3.0** | Full protocol compliance with agent-skill bonding | | **Production Patterns** | DataLoader, Federation, graphql-shield, TypeScript codegen | --- ## Agents ### 7 Specialized GraphQL Agents | # | Agent | Purpose | Expertise | |---|-------|---------|-----------| | 1 | **01-graphql-fundamentals** | Core GraphQL educator | Types, queries, mutations, subscriptions, fragments | | 2 | **02-graphql-schema** | Schema design architect | Naming conventions, pagination, error handling, interfaces | | 3 | **03-graphql-resolvers** | Performance specialist | DataLoader, N+1 prevention, batching, context design | | 4 | **04-graphql-apollo-server** | Server configuration expert | Apollo Server v4, plugins, federation, caching | | 5 | **05-graphql-apollo-client** | React integration expert | Hooks, cache management, optimistic UI, subscriptions | | 6 | **06-graphql-security** | Security architect | JWT auth, graphql-shield, rate limiting, validation | | 7 | **07-graphql-codegen** | TypeScript code generation | Types, React hooks, configuration, fragments | ### Invoke Agents ``` Task(subagent_type="graphql:01-graphql-fundamentals") Task(subagent_type="graphql:02-graphql-schema") Task(subagent_type="graphql:03-graphql-resolvers") Task(subagent_type="graphql:04-graphql-apollo-server") Task(subagent_type="graphql:05-graphql-apollo-client") Task(subagent_type="graphql:06-graphql-security") Task(subagent_type="graphql:07-graphql-codegen") ``` --- ## Skills ### 7 Production-Grade Skills | Skill | Description | Complexity | Invoke | |-------|-------------|------------|--------| | **graphql-fundamentals** | Types, queries, mutations, subscriptions | Beginner | `Skill("graphql-fundamentals")` | | **graphql-schema-design** | Naming, pagination, error patterns | Intermediate | `Skill("graphql-schema-design")` | | **graphql-resolvers** | DataLoader, batching, N+1 prevention | Intermediate | `Skill("graphql-resolvers")` | | **graphql-apollo-server** | Server v4, plugins, federation | Advanced | `Skill("graphql-apollo-server")` | | **graphql-apollo-client** | React hooks, cache, optimistic UI | Intermediate | `Skill("graphql-apollo-client")` | | **graphql-security** | Auth, rate limiting, validation | Advanced | `Skill("graphql-security")` | | **graphql-codegen** | TypeScript types, React hooks | Intermediate | `Skill("graphql-codegen")` | ### Skill Features Each skill includes: - Quick reference tables - Production code examples - Troubleshooting guides - Debug checklists - Related skills and agents --- ## Commands | Command | Description | Usage | |---------|-------------|-------| | `/learn` | Interactive GraphQL learning path | `/learn [topic]` | | `/assess` | Knowledge assessment & skill gap analysis | `/assess [topic]` | | `/browse-agent` | Explore 7 specialized GraphQL agents | `/browse-agent [name]` | | `/roadmap` | Complete GraphQL learning roadmaps | `/roadmap [path]` | ### Example Usage ```bash # Start learning GraphQL /learn fundamentals # Assess your knowledge /assess # Browse available agents /browse-agent # View full-stack roadmap /roadmap full-stack ``` --- ## Architecture ### Agent-Skill Bonding ``` Agent Skill (PRIMARY_BOND) â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ 01-graphql-fundamentals â†â†’ graphql-fundamentals 02-graphql-schema â†â†’ graphql-schema-design 03-graphql-resolvers â†â†’ graphql-resolvers 04-graphql-apollo-server â†â†’ graphql-apollo-server 05-graphql-apollo-client â†â†’ graphql-apollo-client 06-graphql-security â†â†’ graphql-security 07-graphql-codegen â†â†’ graphql-codegen ``` ### Learning Path Dependencies ``` fundamentals (no prerequisites) â†“ schema-design (requires: fundamentals) â†“ resolvers (requires: fundamentals, schema) â†“ â”Œâ”€â”€â”´â”€â”€â” â†“ â†“ server client (requires: fundamentals) â”‚ â”‚ â†“ â†“ security codegen ``` --- ## {
  "name": "spring-boot-assistant",
  "version": "2.0.0",
  "description": "Production-grade Spring Boot plugin with specialized agents for microservices, REST APIs, security, reactive programming, and cloud-native development",
  "author": "Developer Roadmap Community",
  "repository": "https://github.com/kamranahmedse/developer-roadmap",
  "homepage": "https://roadmap.sh",
  "license": "SEE LICENSE IN LICENSE",
  "keywords": [
    "spring-boot",
    "spring-boot-3",
    "microservices",
    "spring-cloud",
    "spring-security",
    "spring-data-jpa",
    "spring-webflux",
    "reactive",
    "jwt",
    "oauth2",
    "testcontainers",
    "resilience4j",
    "api-gateway",
    "learning",
    "roadmap",
    "skills"
  ],
  "agents": [
    "./agents/01-spring-boot-fundamentals.md",
    "./agents/02-spring-mvc.md",
    "./agents/03-spring-data.md",
    "./agents/04-spring-security.md",
    "./agents/05-spring-cloud.md",
    "./agents/06-spring-testing.md",
    "./agents/07-spring-reactive.md"
  ],
  "commands": [
    {
      "name": "explore",
      "file": "./commands/explore.md",
      "description": "Discover and explore 65+ developer roadmaps"
    },
    {
      "name": "assess",
      "file": "./commands/assess.md",
      "description": "Evaluate your current skill levels"
    },
    {
      "name": "roadmap",
      "file": "./commands/roadmap.md",
      "description": "Start or continue a personalized learning path"
    },
    {
      "name": "project",
      "file": "./commands/project.md",
      "description": "Get project recommendations and build portfolio"
    }
  ],
  "skills": [
    "./skills/spring-boot-basics/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/spring-rest-api/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/spring-data-jpa/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/spring-security/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/spring-microservices/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/spring-testing/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/spring-reactive/SKILL.md"
  ],
  "settings": {
    "maxAgentsParallel": 7,
    "cacheDuration": 3600,
    "updateFrequency": "weekly"
  }
}
